definition: grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)

sentences.english: And they preferred hunger and famine to the desecration of the ancestral grave…
sentences.chinese: 他們寧可自己忍飢挨餓也不願褻瀆祖先們的墳塋。

sentences.english: Because of these interruptions, Michelangelo worked on the tomb for 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 由於這些中斷，米開朗基羅在墳塋工作了40年。

sentences.english: Death grew pale within the grave.
sentences.chinese: 墳塋中的死鬼，臉色鐵青。

sentences.english: The imperial Tombs of the Ming and Qing Dynasties are four groups of tombs in four provinces of eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 明的皇家墳塋和清朝是四個小組墳塋在東中國四個省。

sentences.english: The imperial Tombs of the Ming and Qing Dynasties are four groups of tombs in four provinces of eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 明的皇家墳塋和清朝是四個小組墳塋在東中國四個省。

sentences.english: For a long time this man had not worn clothes or lived in a house, but had lived in the tombs.
sentences.chinese: 這個人許久不穿衣服，不住房子，只住在墳塋裏。

sentences.english: Jesus left his heavenly throne and descended into the tomb by way of the cross.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌離開祂在天上的寶座，藉着十字架進入墳塋。

sentences.english: In front of mother's grave, I knew why my youngest brother cried hopelessly.
sentences.chinese: 在母親的墳塋前，我理解小弟爲什麼哭得那般絕望。

sentences.english: In her tomb by the side of the sea.
The graves of men on an opposing hill.
sentences.chinese: 對面山上的一座座墳塋。

definition: marble pillar (ornamental column in front of places, tombs)
to go on a hunting expedition
Wenxi county in Yuncheng 運城|运城[Yun4 cheng2], Shanxi
Jintai District of Baoji City 寶雞市|宝鸡市[Bao3 ji1 Shi4], Shaanxi
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
Shouyang county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
to restore old way/to return to the past
oxen and horses/beasts of burden/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
